allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add CLAUDE.md with project guidance for Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:/CourseBuilder; python -m pytest tests/test_content_humanizer.py -v 2>&1 | Select-Object -First 100")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: update CLAUDE.md with missing architecture layers and fixes

- Update test count from 72 to ~85 and add keyword filtering example
- Fix content generation docs to show actual tool-based structured outputs
- Add missing src/ layers: exporters, auth, collab, import, coach, editing
- Expand utils documentation with humanizer and preview renderer
- Add testing note about authenticated_client/client fixtures

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add blueprint auto-fix for common validation issues

- BlueprintAutoFixer class with deterministic fixes
- Duration scaling to meet target \(with min/max bounds per content type\)
- Auto-assign WWHAA phases to activities missing them
- Activity balance suggestions for lessons with < 2 activities
- Refinement feedback generator for AI regeneration prompts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add learner profiles for audience-aware content generation

- LearnerProfile model with technical level, language proficiency,
  learning preferences, context, and accessibility needs
- CRUD API at /api/learner-profiles with 4 default profiles
- Course assignment via /api/courses/<id>/learner-profile
- Prompt context generation for AI content tailoring
- Enums: TechnicalLevel, LanguageProficiency, LearningPreference, LearningContext

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add REST API for image generators

- Video slides: POST /api/courses/<id>/activities/<id>/slides
- Reading images: POST /api/courses/<id>/activities/<id>/images
- Terminal screenshots: POST /api/images/terminal
- CTA slides: POST /api/courses/<id>/activities/<id>/cta-slide
- Standalone endpoints for arbitrary content
- Base64 and binary output formats
- Graceful Pillow fallback with status endpoint

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
test: add Bloom taxonomy validation tests

- TestBloomProgression: regression detection, cognitive progression
- TestActivityBloomAlignment: activity-outcome level matching
- TestBloomCheckIntegration: audit check integration tests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: update tracking documents for v1.3.1 backlog features

STATE.md:
- Add v1.3.1 section with Blueprint Auto-Fix, Learner Profiles,
  Images API, Bloom Validation
- Update Next Steps to show remaining backlog items

IMPROVEMENTS.md:
- Mark Blueprint Auto-Fix as implemented
- Mark Learner Profiles as implemented
- Mark Bloom Validation as implemented
- Mark Course-Level Audience as implemented \(via Learner Profiles\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update blueprint API tests for auto_fix default

Tests now pass auto_fix=False to use the mocked generate\(\) path,
since the API now defaults to generate_with_autofix\(\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\CourseBuilder" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add v2.0 ideas planning document

Major feature categories:
- Intelligence Suite: UDL menus, depth layers, inquiry arcs
- Adaptive Learning: prerequisites, mastery-based, remediation
- Content Enhancement: AI images, video generation, simulations
- Collaboration: SME review, version comparison, team templates
- Analytics: quality scoring, generation tracking, learning preview
- Platform Expansion: LMS integrations, multi-language, mobile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
